## Follow the rules of escalation.
Follow escalation rules against non-hostiles and don't instantly murder someone for annoying you, use common sense.
- Always give verbal warnings before resorting to violence. - Only use as much force to disable the other person. - Make an effort to heal them or bring them to medical personnel. - You can defend yourself to the extent of protecting your own life, if the attacker is not a hostile force. - Military Police should use less-lethal force to effect arrests of criminals. - Adminhelp the situation if you think someone is over-escalating.
